comments.body: Does dartdoc automatically look for a file by this name?  If so, can you add a header comment explaining that (and point to the schema if one exists)?
Yes, it does. As far as I know, there isn't a schema for it. It's read in by this code: https://github.com/dart-lang/dartdoc/blob/master/lib/src/dartdoc_options.dart

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +0,4 @@# This file is used by dartdoc when generating API documentation for Flutter.
dartdoc:
  tools:
    snippet:
